titleStmt.title: The cardinal, a tragedie, as it was acted at the private house in Black Fryers, wriiten by James Shirley. Not printed before
titleStmt.author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Humphrey Robinson at the Three Pigeons, and Humphrey Moseley at the Princes Arms in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Also published as part of: Six new playes, ... All written by James Shirley.--Wing (CD-ROM edition) S3486.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the Princes Arms in St. Paul's Church-yard
